title: Average spend of eating out for lunch in the U.S. 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Days in the x axis and Average cost in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Average cost in U.S. dollars is highest at Days Per year and lowest at Days Per day.
The difference of Average cost in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Days is 1031.86.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average cost in U.S. dollars for 3 number of Dayss.
The Average cost in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Days Per year and lowest at Days Per day.
Second maximum Average cost in U.S. dollars is found at Days Per week.
The highest Days Per year has 1031.86 more Average cost in U.S. dollars than the lowest Days Per day.
The Days Per year tends to be 2.91 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Dayss, we get total 1074.19.
